q1: Croatia was the Rocky Balboa of the World Cup, beat up but never gave up.
q2: I wish they'd never beat England. They'd got so far. It was a shame that they were nocked out in the semi final.
a2: It was a well deserved victory.
q3: Why did Croatia beat England so easily?
a3: I think they have very good chemistry
q4: What was Croatia's record last season?
a4: Croatia reached the world cup final but lost to France.
q5: Was Croatia favored in that game?
a5: Most people expected France to win.
